statements: SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_number, location, issue_date, contractor FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT project_description, location FROM building_permits WHERE architect = 'John Doe';
SELECT permit_id, issue_date, expiry_date FROM building_permits WHERE contractor = 'ABC Construction';
SELECT location, architect, contractor FROM building_permits WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_id = 1000;
SELECT permit_number, location, architect FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT project_description FROM building_permits WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT contractor, COUNT(*) AS total_permits FROM building_permits GROUP BY contractor HAVING total_permits > 5;
SELECT permit_number, project_description, location, permit_status FROM building_permits WHERE architect LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_number, issue_date, permit_holder FROM building_permits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Construction';
SELECT permit_holder, city, state, address FROM building_locations JOIN building_permits ON building_locations.permit_id = building_permits.id;
SELECT id, permit_type, expiration_date FROM building_permits WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Residential' AND issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT permit_holder, issue_date, expiration_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Commercial' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY' ORDER BY zip_code;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM building_locations;
SELECT permit_holder, address, city, state, zip_code FROM building_permits INNER JOIN building_locations ON building_permits.id = building_locations.permit_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_permits;
SELECT building_name, permit_date FROM historical_permits WHERE permit_type = 'construction';
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, permit_status FROM historical_permits WHERE building_name LIKE '%Tower%';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_contact FROM permit_applicants WHERE applicant_address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT building_address, building_type FROM building_details ORDER BY construction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_permits WHERE permit_status='Approved' ORDER BY permit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT permit_id, building_name, permit_date FROM historical_permits WHERE building_name LIKE '%Tower%' AND permit_type='Construction Permit';
SELECT building_address, building_type FROM building_details WHERE construction_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY construction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM permit_applicants WHERE applicant_address LIKE '%Street%' AND LENGTH(applicant_contact) > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT permit_type FROM historical_permits WHERE permit_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT building_name, permit_date FROM building_permits ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, building_name, permit_type FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Residential';
SELECT * FROM permit_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'City%';
SELECT permit_id, action_date, action_description FROM permit_history ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT building_name, permit_date FROM building_permits;
SELECT * FROM permit_locations WHERE location_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_contact FROM permit_applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT permit_id, location_name, location_address FROM permit_locations JOIN building_permits ON permit_locations.permit_id = building_permits.permit_id;
SELECT p.permit_id, h.action_date, h.action_description FROM permit_history h JOIN building_permits p ON h.permit_id = p.permit_id ORDER BY h.action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT building_name, construction_type FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Active';
SELECT permit_id, permit_date, building_name, construction_type FROM building_permits WHERE building_name LIKE '%Center%' ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM construction_materials WHERE material_type = 'Steel' OR material_supplier = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT worker_name, worker_position FROM construction_workers WHERE worker_contact LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT building_name, construction_type FROM building_permits WHERE permit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT permit_id, building_name, construction_type FROM building_permits WHERE construction_type = 'Residential' AND permit_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY permit_id DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_contact, applicant_address FROM permit_applicants WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM construction_materials WHERE material_supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
